content.en: Metal deformation prediction: Artificial neural networks are being used to accurately predict the flow stress and deformation behavior of various metals and alloys, such as stainless steel, low alloy steel, and aluminum alloys. These algorithms are developed to model and simulate the behavior of these materials under different conditions, such as elevated temperatures and hot deformation. By utilizing artificial neural networks, researchers are able to accurately predict and evaluate the flow stress and deformation behaviors of these materials, which can have important applications in industries such as manufacturing and materials engineering.
content.da: Forudsigelse af metaldeformation: Kunstige neurale netværk bruges til nøjagtigt at forudsige strømningsspænding og deformationsadfærd for forskellige metaller og legeringer, såsom rustfrit stål, lavlegeret stål og aluminiumslegeringer. Disse algoritmer er udviklet til at modellere og simulere adfærden af disse materialer under forskellige betingelser, såsom forhøjede temperaturer og varm deformation. Ved at anvende kunstige neurale netværk kan forskere nøjagtigt forudsige og evaluere strømningsspænding og deformationsadfærd af disse materialer, hvilket kan have vigtige anvendelser i industrier som fremstilling og materialeteknik.
